name: Sun
description: The sun goddess Amaterasu is the most important deity in the Shinto religion, and she is believed to be the direct ancestor of all Japanese emperors.

name: Sirius
description: The Ancient Greeks thought that Sirius's emanations could affect dogs adversely.

name: Polaris
alternate_names: North Star or Alpha Ursae Minoris

name: Betelgeuse
description: Its name is derived from a misreading of the Arabic "yad al-jawza."

name: Rigel
description: In Japan, the Minamoto or Genji clan chose Rigel and its white color as its symbol, calling the star "Genji-boshi."

name: Vega
description: To the ancient Greeks, the constellation Lyra was formed from the harp of Orpheus, with Vega as its handle.

name: Antares
description: In the Babylonian star catalogues dating from at least 1100 BC, Antares was called "the Breast of the Scorpion."
